data.text: I will rise now, and go about in the city,
The watchmen who go their rounds in the city found me.
It was as a little while after I parted from them,
I have charged you, O daughters of Jerusalem,
Who is this that comes up from the wilderness
King Solomon made himself a litter of woods of Lebanon.
He made the pillars of it silver,
Go forth, ye daughters of Zion,
